reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We only had one night in Dar, on our way home from Zanzibar, and we booked this place based on the review in the Lonely Planet guide (by the way, that guide book gets things wrong way too many times!).
reviews.title: Nicely Renovated Art Deco But a Little Far From Town Center

reviews.text: The hotel is clean, newly renovated to seem more like a Marriott (with a bit more style), and it is fine for a night. The evening staff weren't falling over themselves to be helpful.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel

reviews.text: It is a taxi ride away from the downtown action; a taxi will cost about $5-10.
reviews.title: Pleasant Return to an Old Favorite

reviews.text: My Father, Wife and I shared a triple for a couple of nights and a few weeks later my wife and I came back to Dar and spent another 3 nights in this hotel.
reviews.title: Adequate budget one night stop-over hotel.
Excellent hotel, great service
reviews.text: On our first stay we were disapointed with the triple rooms functuality and decor and we where not sure if we would return, but luckuly we did, because the double room was very nice and comfy.
